summary: One thing that I\'ve noticed about the work shop is it is full of mods that remove the \"I took an arrow to the knee\" line from the guards dialog. Well here is a mod that does exactly the oppisite and makes them incapable of saying anything else.
descriptionHtml: One thing that I\'ve noticed about the work shop is it is full of mods that remove the \"I took an arrow to the knee\" line from the guards dialog. Well here is a mod that does exactly the oppisite and makes them incapable of saying anything else.
author: ulera
